The Arthaelean Empire

The Arthalean Empire once stretched from the eastern shore of the North Sea of Paraesi, almost to the western shore of the Dire Sea. It was founded around 1,294 BC by the first emporer Sherum-Ishtar, and collapsed somewhere between 224 BC and 208 BC, the reign of the final emporer Wurnstal.

After the fall of the Empire the most significant emerging factions were the kingdoms of Vangrund and Grayvaene, and the Temple Protectorate of Arthale.
